description: Explore how the Opulus platform revolutionizes the music industry with its innovative NFT roadmap, outlining key phases and milestones in bridging music and finance through blockchain technology.
keywords: Opulus, NFT, music industry, blockchain, decentralized finance, DeFi, music investment, tokenized music, NFTs, artist empowerment, music rights, fan engagement, financial inclusion
title: The Opulus NFT Roadmap: Revolutionizing Music and Finance
